Class com.chimu.form.description.SimpleFormInfoAbsClass 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.form.description.SimpleFormInfoAbsClass
public abstract class SimpleFormInfoAbsClass
extends Object
implements FormInfo, MapperBuilder
SimpleFormInfoAbsClassFormInfoAbsClass provides an abstract implementation of the FormInfo protocol combined with the MapperBuilder protocol. This class serves as both a FormInfo object and a MapperBuilder object, so it return itselfs when asked for its mapperBuilder.

Subclasses must implement the MapperBuilder protocol: #createMappers(), #configureMappers(), #configureCompleted. These methods are called in subsequent stages of mapper building: first the #createMappers of all MapperBuilder objects are called, then the #configureMappers of all the MapperBuilder objects, and then #configureCompleted. During each stage the order of calling MapperBuilders is indeterminate.

Subclasses have two main instance variables set at creation time: 'orm' and 'dbConnection'. They can also have 'myClass' set at creation time which allows parameterized class-dependent behavior instead of pure subclassing behavior. For subclassing behavior, override 'myClass()' to return the appropriate class object.

Variable Index

- dbConnection
- myClass
- orm

Constructor Index

SimpleFormInfoAbsClass()

Method Index

configureCompleted()
Creation and configuration have been completed for all Mappers, do any final activities and notifications required for the mapper.
configureMappers()
Configure the created mappers.
createMappers()
Create and add to the Orm all mappers used by this builder.
initOrm_db(Orm, DatabaseConnection)
This method can only be used if the FormInfo subclass explicitly knows its DomainClass object
initOrm_db_class(Orm, DatabaseConnection, Class)
mapperBuilder()
I function as my own mapperBuilder
myClass()

Subclasses may want to override this to explicitly set the desired DomainClass, this allows the FormInfo to be created without passing in an explicit class

createMappers 
 public abstract void createMappers()
Create and add to the Orm all mappers used by this builder. During this stage you can not assume any other mappers exist.

configureMappers 
 public abstract void configureMappers()
Configure the created mappers.
